metadata.title: CVE-2021-41498 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in ajaxsoundstudio.com Pyo &lt and 1.03 in theServer_jack_init function. which allows attackers to conduct Denial ofService attacks by arbitrary constructing a overlong server name.

criterions.comment: python-pyo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
